reviews: This is the brightest head lamp on the market. It was brighter than I expected. I was going to buy another handheld 2000 lumens flashlight to go along with this one too but after using it, this is all I need. And It fits on my head so I don't have to use a hand to hold a flashlight. I haven't used it that long so I don't know the battery life. I don't use the full 4000 lumens. Just the 2nd or 3rd setting is all I needed. It's great for getting to your deer stand at 5am in the morning when it's still pitch black outside. Or tracking your deer at 7pm at night when it's pitch black. Highly recommended. Would definitely buy again.

reviews:
I have about 10 headlamps in my drawer, ALL SUCK!!! THIS WAS THE BEST EVER PORTABLE LIGHT I HAVE EVER HAD,SEEN,HEARD OF, even THOUGHT WAS POSSIBLE!!!!!

100% MUST BUY!!!!

Just buy 1 more battery for backup and you’ll be set for an 8 hour work day. Supper EAZY to install the battery and charges relatively quick. If you want to be a hot shot in your environment with the brightest light, THIS IS IT!!
